ResourceHeader.ResourceName: CLU3 WHISPER electric field power spectral density of natural waves
ResourceHeader.Description:
This dataset contains the electric field power spectral density observed by WHISPER on Cluster-3.
Compared to the WHI_NATURAL and WHI_ACTIVE datasets, the particularity of this dataset is that bandwidth of the measurements is large, so as to optimise the time resolution.
The dataset includes data obtained both when the sounder is active and passive (natural waves).
The support data includes : 
    a flag to indicate sounder activity the number of elementary spectra which have been summed. Individual spectral are acquired every 13.33 ms, and these spectra are averaged to improve the statistics.
    an indicator of how many, if any, of the individual spectra were saturated.

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 WHISPER Electric Spectral Power Density of natural waves broad frequency band
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3 WHISPER  mean power density measured  in a broad frequency band, with a high time resolution
